verbs.description: [ARG0: Rudy Giuliani] , [ARGM-TMP: currently] [V: serving] [ARG1: as President Trump 's lawyer] [ARGM-LOC: in the Russia probe] , called for the investigation to be brought to a close by Friday in an interview with Sean Hannity on Thursday night .
